narrative_summary: One major thread concerns: "38 hours after AI 171 crash: AI Boeing 777 got 'stall, ground proximity & don’t sink warning’ on take off from Delhi" (representative of 17 article(s)). One major thread concerns: "IIT-Madras to mentor Telangana's Sircilla govt school students; 8-week online course to focus on AI & more" (representative of 7 article(s)). One major thread concerns: "Activists accuse food regulator of stalling on-pack labelling regulation" (representative of 6 article(s)). One major thread concerns: "Startups to giants: India rides the AI wave to sustainability" (representative of 6 article(s)). Chronologically, coverage moves from initial reports to follow-ups that add context, statements, and policy reactions. Together these pieces highlight the interplay between events, official responses, and broader implications.
